thread.title: Watch Kate Hudson Laugh Off the Nick Jonas Dating Rumors
thread.title_full: Watch Kate Hudson Laugh Off the Nick Jonas Dating Rumors

author: TV Guide
title: Watch Kate Hudson Laugh Off the Nick Jonas Dating Rumors
text: Watch Kate Hudson Laugh Off the Nick Jonas Dating Rumors Rumor has been swirling that Kate Hudson and Nick Jonas... Comment Canton   TV Guide Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 5:08 PM Updated at 8:23 PM Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 5:08 PM Updated at 8:23 PM Rumor has been swirling that Kate Hudson and Nick Jonas are dating, but don't expect actress herself to weigh in on the subject. On Tuesday's Watch What Happens Live , when a viewer asked if she was dating the Kingdom star, Hudson initially laughed and then added, "I don't like addressing any kind of gossipy stuff. My agent has been my mystery man maybe 25 times. You can't hug someone or talk to someone without it ending up being a thing." Watch the full clip, which includes Andy Cohen passionately wishing that the two end up together. Watch What Happens Live airs Sundays-Thursdays at 11/10c on Bravo. Other Links From TVGuide.com
